casebody.data:
TD BANK, N.A.
v.
EAGLES CREST AT SHARP TOP, LLC, et al. 350PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 7, 2017 David R. Payne, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for Eagles Crest At Sharp Top, LLC, et al. Norman J. Leonard, Attorney at Law, Lance P. Martin, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for TD Bank, N.A.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 5th of June 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of June 2017."

*614Defendant shall have up to and including the 12th day of June 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
